thread.title: Activists bash Apple's plan to block protests in French stores

title: Activists bash Apple's plan to block protests in French stores
text:
Activists bash Apple's plan to block protests in French stores 1:35pm EST - 01:27 
Hundreds of protesters have stormed a Paris courthouse where a legal battle between tech giant Apple and a French anti-globalisation group rages on. Laura Frykberg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Hundreds of protesters have stormed a Paris courthouse where a legal battle between tech giant Apple and a French anti-globalisation group rages on.
